item.title: Fun with Unicode in Java
item.description: Fun with Unicode in Java Normally we don’t pay much attention to character encoding in Java. However, when we crisscross byte and char streams, things can get confusing unless we know the charset basics. Many tutorials and posts about character encoding are heavy in theory with little real examples. In this post, we try to demystify Unicode with easy to grasp examples. Encode and Decode Before diving into Unicode, first let’s understand terms - encode and decode.
